title: I need help asap please!!!!
body: As soon as I enter a match My league locks up my whole laptop. I have an hp with an i7 processor, it's less than a year old and has no issues with anything else. I have no clue why it would load everything then lock up after being in match for about 10 secs. I have submitted a help ticket but its been 36 hours with no response still. please someone help me i have tried everything.

replies.body:
This is likely caused by the Windows Game bar feature called *Game DVR* that was enabled by the anniversary update. I suggest [turning off the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this for you.

Let me know if it did.

The Windows update ruined LoL for me too. For me it's fixed by always starting LoL through:
1) Right click pictogram on desktop.
2) Fix compability problems.
3) Recommended settings.
4) Test.

Greetings!

I'm afraid I have next to no clue about your problem, but I'd like to tell you that the Rioters are doing their best to help you and other people in need.

There's no need to worry my friend! You'll get your respons sooner or later  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

- Okuma
